source.name: q1
source.instructions: You deploy Flask webserver on an EC2 instance. Deploying the service in multiple subnets can ensure highly available and fault-tolerant architecture.

answers.answer: True, only in case the subnets was created in different regions.
False, we can use one subnet that spans over multiple AZs.
True, only in case the subnets was created in different AZs.
False, multiple VPCs can ensure highly available and fault-tolerant architecture.
